oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-03-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 10, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Jim Warren, Del Wood, Rod Brasfield, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rod Brasfield; Jimmy C. Newman; Grandpa Jones; Marty Robbins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Jimmy Newman -- Seasons Of My Heart (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Marty Robbins introduces Grandpa Jones -- Old Blue (Grandpa Jones) -- Marty Robbins talks -- I'll Go On Alone (Marty Robbins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Old Hickory Singers; Robbins, Marty; Newman, Jimmy C.
